Metadata: Solver version, user, HPC job ID, date/time, run duration
Analysis type (static, dynamic, nonlinear), model name

Mesh_and_Result_Interchange: CGNS if extended to structural? (less common for FEA)

Stress_Strain_Fields: Element/nodal stress, strain, von Mises, principal stresses
Thermal_Results: Temperature distribution, conduction results, thermal stress
Contact_and_Interfaces: Contact pressure, gap info, friction models
Nonlinear_Results: Plastic strain, large displacement logs, solver iteration info
